column4: Hi everyone, I cannot choose to install Ubuntu side by side with Windows 7 and the installer suggests installing within WIndows (using WUBI)
if you open gparted how many partitions do you see?
Is this a booted live cd as awell
UEFI is a bit tricky I believe I can't personally help hopefully someone can. If you don't get help here you might consider the ubuntu forums as well.
